src:
Carmen y Juan, una cita en el cementerio
El español aseguró que sintió que se le rompió algo.
02 Nov 2019, 17:00 by AFP
"La sensación es que me he roto algo", declaró Rafael Nadal, número 2 del ranking ATP, tras retirarse este sábado justo antes de su semifinal en el Masters 1000 de París por unos "dolores en los abdominales".
"En el último servicio de mi calentamiento esta mañana he sentido algo en los abdominales. Vuelvo a casa para hacer las pruebas, hay que esperar unos días para ver lo que tengo, no creo que sea grave según los médicos", explicó.
"Alguna pequeña fibra ha saltado. La sensación es que me he roto algo. Habrá que esperar 48 horas para hacer un test real y ver cómo van las cosas", detalló.
El español, que no había jugado ningún torneo oficial desde su victoria en el US Open por una lesión en la mano izquierda, debía medirse al canadiense Denis Shapovalov (N.28) para intentar alcanzar a Novak Djokovic en la final de este torneo que nunca ha conquistado.
"De momento debo recuperarme y en función de eso se verá el calendario. Esperamos que pueda jugar para Londres (Masters, 10-17 noviembre),es el objetivo", añadió.
De esta manera, el canadiense se medirá al serbio el domingo en el partido por el título, luego de que Djokovic eliminara un poco antes al búlgaro Grigor Dimitrov (N.27) por 7-6 (7/5), 6-4.
La tormentosa historia de Nadal con el torneo parisino suma un nuevo capítulo, después de verse obligado a renunciar en varias ocasiones. Era la primera vez en seis años que alcanzaba las semifinales.
Rey absoluto de Roland Garros, donde ha vencido en doce ocasiones, el balear nunca ha tocado el techo de Bercy. En 2007 alcanzó su única final, que perdió contra el argentino David Nalbandian.
Este abandono reaviva el suspense por la lucha por el primer puesto mundial a final de año, que se disputan Djokovic y Nadal, que tiene asegurado volver a lo más alto del ranking el lunes.
text:
Taurus’s personal life is changing dramatically, and Aquarius will strive for leadership
Horoscope for November 3.

02 Nov 2019, 17:00

Aries will have the opportunity to skillfully use old acquaintances. It is expected a change in relations within the family, advancement in new relationships. Taurus will determine their choice finally. Perhaps your position will be influenced by an authoritative person. But for the upcoming changes, you are determined decisively and adamantly. For many of you, the situation in your personal life is radically changing. The twins will be preoccupied with their appearance. This will especially affect women. It is necessary to restore health. The probability of a good mood after positive changes is very high. Crayfish will be attentive to the problems of a loved one. You will be concerned about issues related to the home climate, the stability of the everyday side of life. Lions will be bound by obligations that repeat the problems of the past. Difficulties arise again in you, from which you had previously skillfully slipped away. The situation is complicated by the need for immediate action. Own weaknesses will aggravate the situation. Virgo will act in difficult conditions for themselves. There will be a need to make quick decisions, communicate with a new circle of people. You will spend money more often than usual. However, you will be responsible for the condition of loved ones. You will be interested in personal comfort and living conditions. Libra will feel the need for support from an influential person. You do not want to lose position in the eyes of others. Your charm will know no bounds. Scorpions will be helped by almost strangers. Your goals are achievable. You are not deprived of creative thoughts and productively act in matters of interest to you. Sagittarius will feel a decline in activity. Your possibilities are limited, your reserves are exhausted. It is necessary to restore energy potential. Fate will provide you with an excellent opportunity to resolve this issue. Capricorns will be in motion. Always practical, now you will be somewhat frivolous, far from material problems. You will easily spend money, finding a reason for joy and inspiration in simple earthly things. Aquarians will be suspicious and prone to exaggerating their problems. It will seem to you that you are being shunned, neglected by your society. You will strive for leadership in spite of anyone's interests. Fishes may disagree with those on whom they have always depended. Your energy potential will increase. Health problems will go away, giving the opportunity to a vivid manifestation of your business qualities.
